scripts.build-all: npx nx run-many --targets=build --projects=@portal/components,@portal/plugin && npx nx run-many --targets=build,build-mri --exclude @portal/components,@portal/plugin && yarn build-ui5
scripts.build-all-skip-cache: npx nx run-many --targets=build --projects=@portal/components,@portal/plugin --skip-nx-cache && npx nx run-many --targets=build,build-mri --exclude @portal/components,@portal/plugin --skip-nx-cache && yarn build-ui5
scripts.portal-ui: yarn; nx build @portal/plugin; nx build @portal/components; nx build portal; nx build-mri portal
scripts.superadmin-ui: yarn; nx build @portal/plugin; nx build @portal/components; nx build superadmin
scripts.flow: yarn; nx build @portal/plugin; nx build @portal/components; nx build flow
scripts.base:ui: REPO_RELATIVE_PATH='../d2e' && GIT_HEAD_COMMIT_ALP_UI_REPO=$(git rev-parse HEAD) docker compose --file ${REPO_RELATIVE_PATH}/docker-compose.yml --file ${REPO_RELATIVE_PATH}/docker-compose-local.yml
